PHRASE.LANG: By popular demand Lockwood presents the Bacon Companion. Bacon that's given is always better than bacon you buy yourself. Lockwood - bringing Home the Bacon. [#Legal]
Suite aux nombreuses demandes, Lockwood présente le bacon qui cartonne. Le bacon qu'on vous donne est toujours meilleur que celui que vous achetez. Lockwood garnit vos assiettes. [#Legal]
Auf vielfachen Wunsch präsentiert Lockwood hiermit den Speckgefährten. Geschenkter Speck schmeckt immer besser als gekaufter. Lockwood - hier ist der Speck zu Hause. [#Legal]
A grande richiesta Lockwood presenta l'amico Bacon. Un po' di Bacon regalato è sempre più buono di quello che compri. Lockwood, porta a casa la pagnotta… con Bacon. [#Legal]
Por petición popular, Lockwood presenta el bacón compañero. El mejor bacón para la parrilla y barbacoas. El bacón de Lockwood, más bueno que el pan. [#Legal]
사람들의 열렬한 호응에 Lockwood 에서 베이컨 컴패니언을 선보입니다. 받은 베이컨은 언제나직접 사는 것보다 좋으니까요. Lockwood - 베이컨 만세! [#Legal]
By popular demand Lockwood presents the Bacon Companion. Bacon that's given is always better than bacon you buy yourself. Lockwood - bringing Home the Bacon. [#Legal]
應廣大顧客的普遍要求，Lockwood特別提供此隨身夥伴。「買的花不如送花香。」Lockwood - 快把他帶回家吧。 [#Legal]
應廣大顧客的普遍要求，Lockwood特別提供此隨身夥伴。「買的花不如送花香。」Lockwood - 快把他帶回家吧。 [#Legal]
By popular demand Lockwood presents the Bacon Companion. Bacon that's given is always better than bacon you buy yourself. Lockwood - bringing Home the Bacon. [#Legal]
